channel.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal
channel.description: Latest Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal comics and news

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Imposter
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
This has always been the incredibly good-looking albatross around my swan-like neck.


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Cooking
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
There are some very nice garnishes of course, but the plate is empty.

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Function
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
Alternatives include piece(shit), hell(a thing), mother(God) and possibly nested functions son(a piece(shit)).

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Error
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
Remember bars? Remember? You wait say Barman- fetch me a beverage so that I have not got to make it myself, and they would actually do it for you!


Today's News:
item.author: tech@thehiveworks.com

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Food choice
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
Algorithms to Live By had a good argument that got me to do this a lot less. Basically, saying you don't know is forcing the other person to use my brainpower, so what appears kind is actually foisting work on others.

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Bastardry
item.description:

Hovertext:

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Lion Autocracy
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
This isn't a clever addendum, but I'm really happy with the way the little pebbles imply motion without the need for whoosh-lines.

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Gates
item.description:

Hovertext:

item.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal - Rendezvous
item.description:
Click here to go see the bonus panel!

Hovertext:
Unfortunately, the definition of celestial body, though ambiguous under International Law conventions, does probably require the pretty girl at a bar to be above the Karman Line.
